languages.text: "Империум не стоит твоей жизни. Останься со мной — мы будем счастливы".

traits.locale_text: "Империум не стоит твоей жизни. Останься со мной — мы будем счастливы".

languages.text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."
languages.original_text: "Империум не стоит твоей жизни. Останься со мной — мы будем счастливы".

traits.locale_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."
"The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."
"The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."
"The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

languages.text: “帝国不值得你牺牲。和我在一起吧，我们会幸福的。”
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

traits.locale_text: “帝国不值得你牺牲。和我在一起吧，我们会幸福的。”

languages.text: «El Imperium no vale su vida. Quédese conmigo. Seremos felices».
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

traits.locale_text: «El Imperium no vale su vida. Quédese conmigo. Seremos felices».

languages.text: 「帝国はお前の命をかけるに値しない。私とともにいれば …お前は幸せになれる」
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国はお前の命をかけるに値しない。私とともにいれば …お前は幸せになれる」

languages.text: « L'Imperium ne vous mérite pas. Restez avec moi, je saurai vous rendre heureux. »
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

traits.locale_text: « L'Imperium ne vous mérite pas. Restez avec moi, je saurai vous rendre heureux. »

languages.text: "Das Imperium ist es nicht wert, dafür zu sterben. Bleibt bei mir – wir werden glücklich sein."
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."

traits.locale_text: "Das Imperium ist es nicht wert, dafür zu sterben. Bleibt bei mir – wir werden glücklich sein."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk, hayatını feda etmeye değmez. Benimle kal. Birlikte mutlu olalım."
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is not worth your life. Stay with me — we will be happy."
